plot: In this country, disused human replicas are locked in a confidential area. They are giving limited "freedom" and form a human-like community. The Government researches their ecology, however, its report is classified.
title: Something Sweet for Orphans
plot_es: In this country, disused human replicas are locked in a confidential area. They are giving limited "freedom" and form a human-like community. The Government researches their ecology, however, its report is classified.
